Articles.Content: I read an article about a guy named jeb bush who wants to be candidate for U.S. president. As I know jeb is a pretty rare name. And remember the jeb Kerman for president. You know what I'm talking about. Post your thoughts below

Oh, look! An opportunity for NASA to finally get its budget back!

MOAR BOOSTER
It's JEB, it's not his actual name. It's his initials.
Colonial elections? I care not, by jove...

Jebediah Kerman as president?

I would buy ATK shares...
I doubt a similarity in name would change anything relating to space. *Prepares popcorn for politics*

Jeb Kerman's economic stimulus plan: Crash rockets into building. Good for jobs in the aerospace industry and civil engineering.

Best,

-Slashy

/I wonder how long we can keep this thread alive without somebody ruining it by going political

Isn't there a rule to keep politics off the forums?

I know this thread is in good humor, but still.
Whats also funny is that Jeb the candidates campaign sign is the same as what the other Kerbals say when Jeb the Kerbal is about to crash something: Jeb!
Here's an idea for ya... an EPA mod, with a UN addon, which will bring KSP to a complete halt.

Isn't there a rule to keep politics off the forums?

I know this thread is in good humor, but still.

I think we're safe as long as we remain politically correct... or was it incorrect... bah.

The numerous complaints about the violations of the rules, and yet no reports made....MUST I DO EVERYTHING MYSELF AROUND HERE?

Thread locked.
